text:
Bronx and Pelham Parkway, west from about Bronxwood Ave., showing, in the background, part of the elevated station of the I.R.T. White Plains Road subway line.

1923.

Joseph P. Day.
title: Bronx: Bronx and Pelham Par - Bronxwood Avenue

original_title: Bronx: Pelham Parkway North - Bronxwood Avenue
text:
Pelham Parkway North (vantage point, not seen), north side, east from Bronxwood Ave. to Williamsbridge Road, showing units of the New York Institute for the Education of the Blind.

August 2, 1928.

P. L. Sperr.
